Venue.title: Crowne Plaza Asheville
Venue.summary: • 34000 square feet of meeting and banquet facilities • 274 well-appointed guest rooms, including 4 suites and 17 King Executive suites • Complimentary parking • Complimentary high-speed wireless internet • Award-winning restaurant • Mulligan’s Bar & Grille, featuring sandwiches, snacks and drink specials • On-site golf, indoor and outdoor tennis, and swimming • Tennis and Golf Pro Shop • Fitness center with brand new state of the art equipment • Concierge and bell services • Pet Friendly rooms are available

Event.title: YAPC::NA 2011
Event.subtitle: YAPC North America 2011
Event.description: Annual North American YAPC Perl conference

Session.title: Intro to Moose
Session.summary:
Moose is a postmodern object system for Perl 5 that takes the tedium out of writing object-oriented Perl. It is a key technology in the Modern Perl toolbox and is used in an ever growing number of CPAN modules and by an ever growing list of companies.
This talk will introduce you to the central concepts and features of Moose as well as show you where Moose can fit into your personal toolbox.
